price: 98. Les habitants des cités avaient-ils donc la certitude que Nos rigueurs ne les surprendraient point le jour, pendant leurs loisirs ?
arabic: أَوَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُم بَأۡسُنَا ضُحٗى وَهُمۡ يَلۡعَبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: awa-amina ahlu al-qurā an yatiyahum basunā ḍuḥan wahum yalʿabūna
